first

public T first()
        throws jss2.exceptions.EmptyCollectionException
Returns a reference to the element at the front of this list. The element is not removed from the list. Throws an EmptyCollectionException if the list is empty.

Specified by:
first in interface ListADT<T>
Returns:

Throws:

last

public T last()
       throws jss2.exceptions.EmptyCollectionException
Returns a reference to the element at the rear of this list. The element is not removed from the list. Throws an EmptyCollectionException if the list is empty.

Specified by:
last in interface ListADT<T>
Returns:
a reference to the last element of this list
Throws:
